name: Trespass the Game/Demo
description:
Trespass is a visual novel game soon to be completed. This is the demo version of the visual novel, Trespass. 

You'll play as a private cyber crime detective who is trying to solve some cases. 
Gameplay, includes 3 different cyber crime cases that the player needs to solve with the help of narrative style storytelling and dialogues. 

Demo version includes puzzles and point&click options. +Animated Characters

This game is started as a school project then become an independent project.

It is based on the idea of "gamification of cyber crime and cyber safety."


Enjoy!
